sent.orig: Laboratory, clean room, control room, datarooom, hospital, GMP drug factory, food factory, electronic factory, textile factory.
sent.trans: 实验室、无尘（菌）室、仪控室、资料室、医院、GMP、药厂、食品工厂、电子、纺织厂等。

sent.orig: Fuhe Glass has cooperated with factory, lighting factory, factory and electrical supporting industry for many years.
sent.trans: 公司有多年与家具厂、灯饰厂、电子厂、电器业配套的服务经验。

sent.orig: For plant hardware factory, chemical factory, car-fixed factory, which need impact-resistance and anti-corrosion.
sent.trans: 要求耐重压、耐强力冲击、耐腐蚀的机械厂、五金制品厂、化工厂操作区、汽车修理厂等。

sent.orig: For hardware factory, plane parking shed car –fixed factory, foodstuff factory, large-sized kitchen and hospital, etc.
sent.trans: 五金工厂、飞机停机棚、汽修厂、食品厂、大型厨房、学校、医院等。

sent.orig: And the Beijing factory of northern region, Tianjin factory, Harbin factory already exist in name only.
sent.trans: 而北方地区的北京厂、天津厂、哈尔滨厂早已名存实亡。
